attributes.action: To instruct Relevant parties to Investigate Hillsborough Disaster in 1989 to investigate if Criminal Charges should be brought against any organisation or person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 15th April 1989, 96 Liverpool Football Fans Lost thier Lives at Hillsborough Sheffield Wednesdays football Ground. An enquiry has been held which outlined the failings which took place, But to date no Criminal charges have been taken against any person or organisation. We ask the Prime Minister to instruct the relevant parties to investigate whether criminal charges should be brought

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to instruct Relevant parties to Investigate Hillsborough Disaster in 1989 to investigate if Criminal Charges should be brought against any organisation or person.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
